column1: The S&P CNX Nifty closed at 5137.45 points on January 31, 2008 representing a fall of 1001.15 points (-16.31%), as compared to 6138.6 points on
December 31, 2007. During the month of January 2008, S&P CNX Nifty touched a high of 6357.1 points on January 08, 2008 before closing at
5137.45 points on January 31, 2008. The market capitalisation of  S&P CNX Nifty decreased from Rs.3522527 crores on December 31, 2007 to
Rs.2966421 crores on January 31, 2008, i.e. a decrease of Rs.556106 crores (-15.79%).
* Beta & R2 are calculated for the period 01-Feb-2007 to 31-Jan-2008
* Beta measures the  degree to which any portfolio of stocks is affected as compared to the effect
on the market as a whole.
* The coefficient of determination (R2) measures the strength of relationship between two variables
the return on  a security versus that of the market.
* Volatility is the Std. deviation of the daily returns for the period 01-Jan-2008 to 31-Jan-2008
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is for a portfolio of Rs. 50 lakhs
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is the weightage average impact cost
